title: The Problem
content: Busy workers and travelers lack time to prepare food at home or wait long for a meal at the restaurant.

title: My Role
content: UX designer designing an app for Sit&Eat from conception to delivery.

title: The Goal
content: Design a Sit&Eat app that allows user to make a restaurant reservation and / or easily pick up or eat dishes of all types of food.

title: Responsabilities
content: Conducting interviews, paper and digital wireframing, low-fidelity and high-fidelity prototyping, usability studies, accessibility accounting, and design iteration.
